title: A discussion on the current state of Horror films
itunes:title: A discussion on the current state of Horror films
description:
George Noory and Mr. Lobo discuss Horror movies. Mr. Lobo presents an argument for having physical media over streaming services. He also gives his opinion on why people are attracted to horror films and why they like to be scared.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
George Noory and Mr. Lobo discuss Horror movies. Mr. Lobo presents an argument for having physical media over streaming services. He also gives his opinion on why people are attracted to horror films and why they like to be scared.
